# KeyValuePairHelper.Create&lt;K,V&gt; method

Creates a new KeyValuePair from its values.

```csharp
public static KeyValuePair<K, V> Create<K, V>(K key, V value)
```

| --- | --- |
| K | Key type |
| V | Value type |
| key | Key value |
| value | value |

## Return Value
